Title: Taxonomy Population Group
Description: The respondant may select the DEI Taxonomy codes referring to Population Group

Title: Taxonomy Category
Description: The respondant may select the DEI Taxonomy codes referring to Categories within a Population Group

Title: Taxonomy Subcategory
Description: The respondant may select the DEI Taxonomy codes referring to Subcategories within a Category

Title: Geography
Description: The respondant may enter a description of the relevant geography in a field

Title: Lived Experience
Description: The respondant may enter a description of the relevant lived experience in a field

Title: General
Description: The respondant may declare that this is general and therefore not aimed at or consisting of a specific group of people

Title: Prefer Not To Say
Description: The respondant may select an option that they prefer not to say
